backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing content items with admin-gated CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated summaries describing key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH theme tokens and global background/text settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with inline dark background CSS and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with protected routes, page-level guards, and admin seeding.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterMod: Modal for user registration with form fields, validation, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/content/AdminCon: Admin form to add content via Drive links, video uploads, or documents with validation and upload tracking.
Displays a list of admin content items with status toggles, type indicators, and deletion workflow.
frontend/src/components/content/DriveVid: Embeds a Google Drive video or shows an error with fallback link if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/content/LiveEmbe: Shows an iframe preview of a live-embed URL with error handling and external-open option.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Them: Diagnostic banner that checks theme CSS, variables, and background when enabled via query param.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card component with optional hover animations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing background, navbar visibility control, and theme diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/motion/AnimatedR: Simple wrapper applying a fade‑in animation to routed content.
frontend/src/components/motion/BabyComed: Animated visual component showing baby‑themed images and effects for login screens.
frontend/src/components/nav/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component handling desktop/mobile menus, session-based access checks, and logout/navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/PremiumCard.tsx: Interactive premium card with icon, title, hover effects, and optional description/children.
frontend/src/components/routing/AdminRou: Route guard that renders children only for admin users, redirecting others to the home page.
frontend/src/components/routing/Protecte: Ensures a session exists, redirects unauthenticated users to login, and logs page visits for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/routing/SectionR: Guards sections based on page permissions, redirecting unauthorized or unauthenticated users while allowing admin bypass.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Status badge displaying approved or pending states with color and animation cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting content items and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Loads session from storage, refreshes permissions, and listens for session changes while tracking loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a luxury dark theme, animations, glass effects, and navbar UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing users, permissions, analytics, and content items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing user details and navigation cards based on access permissions.
frontend/src/pages/IntelusPage.tsx: Displays Intelus content, separating video and document items fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Renders live embed items or a placeholder when no live content exists.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login, analytics logging, redirect logic, and optional registration modal.
frontend/src/pages/MyFilesPage.tsx: Shows user-accessible document items with options to open files.
frontend/src/pages/MyVideosPage.tsx: Displays user video content by filtering items for video types and rendering embedded or uploaded videos with metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Renders a portfolio page with a styled iframe embedding an external website.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Automatically redirects to the login page while preserving return-to parameters.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Shows a static grid of embedded YouTube videos inside styled cards.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: LocalStorage-based analytics tracker for logins, page visits, and update subscriptions.
frontend/src/utils/auth.ts: Handles user registration, login, logout, approval, and permission updates using local storage.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates video and document uploads for allowed types and size limits, with file-size formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/googleDriveEmbed.ts: Converts Google Drive URLs into embeddable preview links by extracting file IDs.
frontend/src/utils/motion.ts: Defines shared motion and animation configuration constants for UI transitions.
frontend/src/utils/returnTo.ts: Manages capturing, storing, and restoring return-to navigation paths during authentication flows.
frontend/src/utils/seed.ts: Seeds a default admin user into local storage if one does not exist.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides localStorage helpers for users and sessions with change-event subscriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including session-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography/container plugins, and extended theme settings for a dark UI.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable prefixes, aliasing, build output settings, and a dev proxy.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current architecture, requirements, issues, and feature state for auth, permissions, and UI behavior.
